description.brazilian: Mate 1.000 inimigos
description.english: Kill 1000 enemies
description.french: Éliminez 1 000 ennemis.
description.german: Töte 1000 Gegner
description.italian: Uccidi 1000 nemici
description.polish: Zabij 1000 wrogów
description.schinese: 击杀1000名敌人
description.spanish: Mata a 1000 enemigos

description.brazilian: Mate 7 inimigos com apenas um ataque
description.english: Kill 7 enemies with a single attack
description.french: Éliminez 7 ennemis avec une seule attaque.
description.german: Töte 7 Gegner mit einem einzigen Angriff
description.italian: Uccidi 7 nemici con un solo attacco
description.polish: Zabij 7 wrogów jednym atakiem
description.schinese: 单次攻击击杀7名敌人
description.spanish: Mata a 7 enemigos con un solo ataque

description.brazilian: Mate 3 galos com um golpe da gadanha
description.english: Kill 3 roosters with a single scythe swing
description.french: Éliminez 3 coqs avec un seul coup de faux.
description.german: Töte 3 Hähne mit einem einzigen Sensenschwung
description.italian: Uccidi 3 galli con un solo colpo di falce
description.polish: Zabij 3 koguty jednym machnięciem kosy
description.schinese: 用一次镰刀斩击同时击杀3只公鸡
description.spanish: Mata a 3 gallos con un solo golpe de guadaña

description.brazilian: Pegue todos os tesouros em cada nível
description.czech: Získej všechny poklady v každé úrovni
description.english: Catch all treasures in every level
description.french: Attrapez tous les trésors de tous les niveaux.
description.german: Hol dir alle Schätze in jedem Level
description.italian: Prendi tutti i tesori in ogni livello
description.polish: Złap wszystkie skarby w każdym poziomie
description.schinese: 在所有关卡里抓住所有的宝藏鸡
description.spanish: Caza todos los tesoros de cada nivel

description.brazilian: Destrua todos os relógios em cada nível
description.czech: Znič všechny hodiny v každé úrovni
description.english: Destroy all clocks in every level
description.french: Détruisez toutes les horloges de tous les niveaux.
description.german: Zerstöre alle Uhren in jedem Level
description.italian: Distruggi tutti gli orologi in ogni livello
description.polish: Zniszcz wszyskie zegary w każdym poziomie
description.schinese: 摧毁每个关卡里的所有时钟
description.spanish: Destruye todos los relojes de cada nivel

description.brazilian: Conclua o jogo
description.english: Finish the game
description.french: Terminez le jeu.
description.german: Schließe das Spiel ab
description.italian: Completa il gioco
description.polish: Przejdź całą grę
description.schinese: 通关游戏
description.spanish: Termina el juego

description.brazilian: Pegue um tesouro
description.english: Catch a treasure
description.french: Attrapez un trésor.
description.german: Hol dir einen Schatz
description.italian: Prendi un tesoro
description.polish: Złap skarb
description.schinese: 抓住一只宝藏鸡
description.spanish: Caza un tesoro

description.brazilian: Mate um galo-tesouro com a gadanha pouco antes de ele desaparecer
description.czech: Zabij kosou kohouta s pokladem těsně před jeho zmizením
description.english: Kill a treasure rooster with a scythe just before it disappears
description.french: Éliminez un coq à trésor avec la faux juste avant qu'il ne disparaisse.
description.german: Töte einen Schatzhahn mit der Sense, kurz bevor er verschwindet
description.italian: Uccidi un gallo del tesoro con una falce poco prima che scompaia
description.polish: Zabij kosą koguta ze skarbem tuż przed jego zniknięciem
description.schinese: 在宝藏鸡即将消失前，用镰刀杀死他
description.spanish: Mata a un gallo con la guadaña justo antes de que desaparezca

description.brazilian: Faça um inimigo sofrer uma queda mortal
description.czech: Přinuť nepřítele zemřít pádem do propasti
description.english: Cause an enemy to fall to their death
description.french: Éliminez un ennemi en le faisant tomber.
description.german: Lass einen Gegner in seinen Tod fallen
description.italian: Fai morire un nemico facendolo cadere
description.polish: Spraw, by wróg zginął podczas upadku w przepaść
description.schinese: 令一名敌人坠亡
description.spanish: Logra que un enemigo caiga y muera

description.brazilian: Conclua as Docas
description.english: Finish the Docks
description.french: Terminez les Quais.
description.german: Schließe die Docks ab
description.italian: Completa il Porto
description.polish: Przejdź Doki
description.schinese: 完成码头关卡
description.spanish: Acaba los Muelles

description.brazilian: Conclua o Distrito Industrial em menos de 90 segundos em uma tentativa (sem retroceder, sem carregar)
description.czech: Dohrej Průmyslovou čtvrť v čase kratším než 90 sekund na jeden zátah (bez nahrávání a přetáčení)
description.english: Finish the Industrial District in under 90 seconds in one go (no rewinding, no loading)
description.french: Terminez le Quartier industriel en moins de 90 secondes d'un seul coup (pas de retour en arrière ni de chargement).
description.german: Schließe das Industriegebiet in weniger als 90 Sekunden in einem Versuch ab (Kein Zurückspulen oder Laden)
description.italian: Completa il Distretto industriale in meno di 90 secondi in una sola volta (senza riavvolgere né caricare)
description.polish: Przejdź Dzielnicę Przemysłową w czasie krótszym niż 90 sekund za jednym podejściem (bez wgrywania i przewijania)
description.schinese: 在90秒内一命完成工业街区关卡（无回溯，无读档）
description.spanish: Acaba el Distrito industrial en menos de 90 segundos de una sentada (sin rebobinar ni cargar partida)

description.brazilian: Conclua as Cavernas em menos de 3 minutos em uma tentativa (sem retroceder, sem carregar)
description.czech: Dohrej Jeskyně v čase kratším než 3 minuty na jeden zátah (bez nahrávání a přetáčení)
description.english: Finish the Caves in under 3 minutes in one go (no rewinding, no loading)
description.french: Terminez les Grottes en moins de 3 minutes d'un seul coup (pas de retour en arrière ni de chargement).
description.german: Schließe die Höhlen in weniger als 3 Minuten in einem Versuch ab (Kein Zurückspulen oder Laden)
description.italian: Completa le Grotte in meno di 3 minuti in una sola volta (senza riavvolgere né caricare)
description.polish: Przejdź Jaskinię w czasie krótszym niż 3 minuty za jednym podejściem (bez wgrywania i przewijania)
description.schinese: 在3分钟内一命完成洞穴关卡（无回溯，无读档）
description.spanish: Acaba las Cuevas en menos de 3 minutos de una sentada (sin rebobinar ni cargar partida)

description.brazilian: Não deixe nenhum gato vivo no Templo do Gato
description.czech: Nenech jedinou kočku v Kočičím chrámu naživu
description.english: Leave no cat alive in the Cat Temple
description.french: Ne laissez aucun chat survivre dans le Temple des chats.
description.german: Lass im Katzentempel keine Katze am Leben
description.italian: Uccidi tutti i gatti nel Tempio dei gatti
description.polish: Nie zostaw ani jednego kota w Kociej Świątyni przy życiu
description.schinese: 在猫之神庙中击杀所有猫咪
description.spanish: No dejes ni un gato vivo en el Templo gatuno

description.brazilian: Não mate nenhum gato no Templo do Gato
description.czech: Nezabij jedinou kočku v Kočičím chrámu
description.english: Don't kill any cats in the Cat Temple
description.french: N'éliminez aucun chat dans le Temple des chats.
description.german: Töte keine Katzen im Katzentempel
description.italian: Non uccidere i gatti nel Tempio dei gatti
description.polish: Nie zabij ani jednego kota w Kociej Świątyni
description.schinese: 在猫之神庙中不击杀任何猫咪
description.spanish: No mates ni un gato en el Templo gatuno

description.brazilian: Congele 7 inimigos simultaneamente
description.english: Freeze 7 enemies at the same time
description.french: Gelez 7 ennemis simultanément.
description.german: Friere 7 Gegner gleichzeitig ein
description.italian: Congela 7 nemici contemporaneamente
description.polish: Zmróź 7 wrogów w tym samym czasie
description.schinese: 一次冻住7个敌人
description.spanish: Congela 7 enemigos a la vez

description.brazilian: Mate um inimigo com o projétil dele
description.english: Kill an enemy with their own projectile
description.french: Éliminez un ennemi avec son propre projectile.
description.german: Töte einen Gegner mit seinem eigenen Geschoss
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico con il suo proiettile
description.polish: Zabij wroga jego własnym pociskiem
description.schinese: 用敌人自己的子弹击杀他
description.spanish: Mata a un enemigo con su propio proyectil

description.brazilian: Conclua as Salas da Montanha sem pegar nenhuma caveira gritadora
description.czech: Dohrej Horské útroby bez zvednutí jediné klece s křiklouny
description.english: Finish the Mountain Halls without picking any yeller skulls
description.french: Terminez les Grandes salles de la montagne sans ramasser de crânes stridents.
description.german: Schließe die Berghallen ab, ohne Kreischer-Schädel aufzusammeln
description.italian: Completa le Sale sulla montagna senza raccogliere i Teschi urlanti
description.polish: Przejdź Wnętrze Góry nie podnosząc ani jednej klatki z krzykaczami
description.schinese: 完成洞穴关卡，但不捡起任何怒吼者
description.spanish: Acaba las Grutas de la montaña sin recoger calaveras aulladoras

description.brazilian: Deixe a ansiedade tomar conta ao perseguir a Serpente
description.czech: Projev zbrklost při honu na Ptakohada
description.english: Get a little too eager when chasing the Serpent
description.french: Surestimez-vous en poursuivant le Serpent.
description.german: Werde bei der Jagd auf die Schlange ein wenig zu eifrig
description.italian: Diventa un po' troppo impaziente quando insegui il Serpente
description.polish: Postąp zbyt pochopnie podczas pogoni za Ptakowężem
description.schinese: 在追逐羽蛇异兽的时候有点太急了
description.spanish: Acelérate demasiado al perseguir a la Serpiente

description.brazilian: Morra na explosão de um cadáver
description.english: Get killed by an exploding corpse
description.french: Mourez d'un cadavre explosif.
description.german: Werde von einer explodierenden Leiche getötet
description.italian: Fatti uccidere da un cadavere che esplode
description.polish: Zgiń podczas wybuchu martwego wroga
description.schinese: 被死亡尸体的自爆所杀死
description.spanish: Muere por un cadáver explosivo

description.brazilian: Mate um bobo invisível
description.english: Kill an invisible jester
description.french: Éliminez un bouffon invisible.
description.german: Töte einen unsichtbaren Narren
description.italian: Uccidi un giullare invisibile
description.polish: Zabij niewidzialnego błazna
description.schinese: 击杀处于隐身状态的弄臣
description.spanish: Mata a un bufón invisible

description.brazilian: Faça um berserker matar outro inimigo
description.english: Cause a berserker to kill another enemy
description.french: Faites en sorte qu'un berserker élimine un autre ennemi.
description.german: Lass einen Berserker einen anderen Gegner töten
description.italian: Fai in modo che un berserker uccida un altro nemico
description.polish: Spraw, aby berserk zabił innego wroga
description.schinese: 令一名狂战士鸡杀死另一个敌人
description.spanish: Haz que un berserker mate a otro enemigo

description.brazilian: Pegue os reforços de dano aumentado e armadura ao mesmo tempo (apenas na campanha)
description.czech: Získej brnění a zvýšené poškození ve stejnou chvíli (pouze kampaň)
description.english: Get both the armor and the increased damage power-ups at the same time (campaign only)
description.french: Obtenez les bonus d'armure et de dégâts augmentés simultanément (mode campagne uniquement).
description.german: Hol dir gleichzeitig die Rüstung und die Power-Ups für erhöhten Schaden (nur Kampagne)
description.italian: Ottieni la corazza e i potenziamenti dei danni aumentati contemporaneamente (solo campagna)
description.polish: Uzyskaj zbroję i zwiększone obrażenia w tym samym czasie (tylko kampania)
description.schinese: 同时获得护甲和伤害增加效果（仅限战役）
description.spanish: Consigue la armadura y las mejoras de daño al mismo tiempo (solo en la campaña)

description.brazilian: Desvie 7 projéteis inimigos com um golpe da gadanha
description.czech: Odraz 7 nepřátelských střel jediným mávnutím kosy
description.english: Deflect 7 enemy projectiles with a single scythe swing
description.french: Renvoyez 7 projectiles ennemis avec un seul coup de faux.
description.german: Lenke 7 gegnerische Geschosse mit einem einzigen Sensenschwung zurück
description.italian: Devia 7 proiettili nemici con un solo colpo di falce
description.polish: Odbij 7 pocisków jednym machnięciem kosy
description.schinese: 挥舞一次镰刀，弹反7个敌人的子弹
description.spanish: Desvía 7 proyectiles enemigos con un solo golpe de guadaña

description.brazilian: Deixe que a Serpente se divida o máximo possível
description.english: Let the Serpent spread as much as possible
description.french: Laissez le Serpent se scinder au maximum.
description.german: Lass die Schlange sich so weit wie möglich ausbreiten
description.italian: Lascia che il Serpente si diffonda il più possibile
description.polish: Pozwól Ptakowężowi rozprzestrzenić się na całego
description.schinese: 令羽蛇异兽尽可能分裂
description.spanish: Deja que la Serpiente se multiplique tanto como pueda

description.brazilian: Mate um atirador voador pouco antes que ele atire
description.czech: Zabij vznášejícího se odstřelovače během jeho míření
description.english: Kill a flying sniper just before they take their shot
description.french: Éliminez un sniper volant juste avant qu'il ne tire.
description.german: Töte einen fliegenden Schützen kurz vor seinem Schuss
description.italian: Uccidi un cecchino volante poco prima che spari
description.polish: Zabij unoszącego się snajpera w trakcie jego celowania
description.schinese: 在狙击手猫即将开火之前击杀他
description.spanish: Mata a un francotirador volador justo antes de que dispare

description.brazilian: Obtenha 1.000 pontos na Colheita Eterna
description.english: Get 1000 points in Eternal Harvest
description.french: Obtenez 1 000 points en mode Récolte éternelle.
description.german: Erziele 1000 Punkte bei der Ewigen Ernte
description.italian: Ottieni 1000 punti in Raccolto eterno
description.polish: Uzyskaj 1000 punktów w Wiecznych Żniwach
description.schinese: 在永恒收割中获得1000分
description.spanish: Obtén 1000 puntos en Cosecha eterna

description.brazilian: Obtenha 3.000 pontos na Colheita Eterna
description.english: Get 3000 points in Eternal Harvest
description.french: Obtenez 3 000 points en mode Récolte éternelle.
description.german: Erziele 3000 Punkte bei der Ewigen Ernte
description.italian: Ottieni 3000 punti in Raccolto eterno
description.polish: Uzyskaj 3000 punktów w Wiecznych Żniwach
description.schinese: 在永恒收割中获得3000分
description.spanish: Obtén 3000 puntos en Cosecha eterna

description.brazilian: Obtenha 5.000 pontos na Colheita Eterna
description.english: Get 5000 points in Eternal Harvest
description.french: Obtenez 5 000 points en mode Récolte éternelle.
description.german: Erziele 5000 Punkte bei der Ewigen Ernte
description.italian: Ottieni 5000 punti in Raccolto eterno
description.polish: Uzyskaj 5000 punktów w Wiecznych Żniwach
description.schinese: 在永恒收割中获得5000分
description.spanish: Obtén 5000 puntos en Cosecha eterna

description.brazilian: Seja amaldiçoado 6 vezes em uma única partida na Colheita Eterna
description.czech: Buď šestkrát proklet během jednoho pokusu ve Věčných žních
description.english: Get cursed 6 times in a single Eternal Harvest run
description.french: Subissez 6 malédictions au cours d'une même session de Récolte éternelle.
description.german: Werde bei der Ewigen Ernte in einem einzigen Durchgang 6-mal verflucht
description.italian: Ricevi 6 maledizioni in una singola sessione di Raccolto eterno
description.polish: Zostań przeklęty 6 razy podczas jednego podejścia w Wiecznych Żniwach
description.schinese: 在单次永恒收割里被诅咒6次
description.spanish: Sufre 6 maldiciones en un solo recorrido de Cosecha eterna

description.brazilian: Pegue um galo amaldiçoado
description.english: Catch a cursed rooster
description.french: Attrapez un coq maudit.
description.german: Erwische einen verfluchten Hahn
description.italian: Prendi un gallo maledetto
description.polish: Złap przeklętego koguta
description.schinese: 抓住一只被诅咒的公鸡
description.spanish: Caza un gallo maldito
